subprogram.about: Java is a set of computer software and specifications developed by James Gosling at Sun Microsystems, which was later acquired by the Oracle Corporation
C++ is a general-purpose programming language created by Bjarne Stroustrup as an extension of the C programming language, or C with Classes
Python is an interpreted high-level general-purpose programming language. I
